title: Common Tools
content: Children learn about simple tools and their uses in daily life.
examples: Hammer 🔨 – hits nails, Scissors ✂️ – cut paper

title: Simple Machines
content: Students explore basic machines like levers, pulleys, and wheels.

title: Introduction to Electricity
content: Children learn about electrical appliances and safety tips.
examples: Do not touch plugs with wet hands 🚫

title: Introduction to Computers
content: Students discover the parts of a computer and their basic uses.

title: Communication Tools
content: Children learn about ways humans communicate using technology.

title: Transport and Vehicles
content: Students explore different vehicles and their purposes.

title: Sources of Energy
content: Children learn about energy sources like sun, water, wind, and electricity.

title: Materials Around Us
content: Students identify common materials and their properties.
examples: Wood 🌲 – hard, Metal ⚙️ – strong, Cloth 👕 – soft

title: Safety in Technology
content: Children learn basic safety rules when using tools and machines.
examples: Wear gloves 🧤, Avoid sharp objects ✂️, Switch off electrical devices ⚡

title: Inventing and Creating
content: Students are encouraged to explore creativity and make simple inventions.
examples: Build a paper plane ✈️, Create a small model 🏗️, Draw and design 🖍️
